Class HearingAidCentral

  • java.lang.Object
    • HearingAidCentral

  • public class HearingAidCentral
extends java.lang.Object
    This class administers all the hearing aids, it contains a list of the hearing aids, manages the rental status of the devices, and it can add devices to the list.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<HearingAid> hearingAidList
      This is a field for the complete list of hearing aids.
      private java.lang.String name
      This is a field for the name of the central

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      The constructor sets a name for the central and creates the ArrayList.
